name: Carousel
description: I would rate it 7 stars out of 10 in terms of its difficulty level in this project. I learned quite bunch of things in this project.

name: ConnectFour
description: I would rate it 9 stars out of 10 in terms of its difficulty level in this project. However, I enjoyed doing this project, handled all possible errors might occur. Spent lot of time in this project. It is literally my first ever prefect project.

name: Homepage
description: I would rate it 8 stars out of 10 in terms of its difficulty level in this project. Mastering the positioning technique and css in this project

name: IncrementalSearch
description: I would rate it 5 stars out of 10 in terms of its difficulty level in this project. It is not really difficult. Mastered event listeners in this project.

name: ResizablePanes
description: I would rate it 8 stars out of 10 in terms of its difficulty level in this project. The most difficult part was finding solution for the movable slide bar. Not really into this project.

name: Ticker
description: I would rate it 6 stars out of 10 in terms of its difficulty level in this project. Not a tough project. Boring project, not much to talk about it.
